title: Sure, here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 that focus on information extraction (IE) from unstructured, noisy, or insufficient text sources

container-title: IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering

title: **"Deep Learning for Information Extraction from Noisy Text"**

title: **"A Review of Text Extraction Techniques for Information Retrieval"**
**"Information Extraction from Scientific Literature: A Survey"**

title: **"Unsupervised Information Extraction from Noisy Text"**

title: **"Event Extraction from Text: A Survey"**

**"Information Extraction from Emails: A Survey"**

These articles cover a wide range of topics within the field of information extraction, focusing on different types of unstructured, noisy, or insufficient text sources. They provide a comprehensive overview of the challenges, techniques, and applications in this area
